text: 12.13 2 Ko 11.9 Yad binɨb Klays yɨl mɨdebal wakay ogɨnap kɨlop, gɨnek gɨnek tek nɨbop abe gɨpin ak pen, adek nokom olap nep nɨbop ke gɨpin. Adek anɨb ak nɨm, tap yɨp tek dak okok, yɨp ñɨnɨmɨb agɨl ma agɨnek. Anɨgen, tap tɨmel olap gɨnek agɨl gos nepɨm akaŋ? Pen nɨbop gɨtep ma genek anɨb ak, nɨŋɨd kelɨgɨnɨmɨb.
